original_text: But you must return to Egypt and you must bring your youngest brother to me. Then I will know that what you have said is true. Then you will not die.’ Joseph's brothers agreed to do what he told them.
korean_text: 너희 막내 아우를 내게로 데리고 오라 그러면 너희 말이 진실함이 되고 너희가 죽지 아니하리라 하니 그들이 그대로 하니라

sentences.original_text: But you must return to Egypt
and you must bring your youngest brother to me
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 당신들의 막내 동생을 나에게 데려와야 합니다

sentences.original_text: that what you have said is true
